title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 560 - Regulations Of The Board Of Trustees
content:

State Regulations
§ 560.1 - Applicability of this part
§ 560.2 - Application of vehicle and traffic law to all state-operated institutions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 560

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 360[1], 362

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
